content.name: bed
content.label: Bed
content.gloss: furniture that is designed for sleeping

content.name: regular_bed
content.label: Regular bed
content.gloss: Regular bed with one unit for sleeping (most beds)

content.name: bunk_bed
content.label: Bunk Bed
content.gloss: Bed with multiple units for sleeping, typically stacked on top of each other

content.name: loft_bed
content.label: Loft bed
content.gloss: Bed that is raised up (lofted).  Often the space under the bed is used for other purposed (such as placing a couch or a desk)

content.name: hammock
content.label: Hammock
content.gloss: a hanging bed of canvas or rope netting (usually suspended between two trees)

content.name: hammock_sleep_area
content.label: Hammock Sleep Area
content.gloss: Sleeping area for the hammock

content.name: hammock_attachment
content.label: Hammock Attachment
content.gloss: Attachment of hammock to trees

content.name: bed_unit
content.label: Bed Unit
content.gloss: A bed unit consists of the mattress and the frame

content.name: bed_sleep_area
content.label: Bed sleep area
content.gloss: Part of the bed that is for sleeping

content.name: bed_frame
content.label: Bed frame
content.gloss: Frame for the bed

content.name: bed_post
content.label: Bedpost
content.gloss: any of 4 vertical supports at the corners of a bedstead

content.name: bed_frame_base
content.label: Bed frame base
content.gloss: a support or foundation for bed. It includes but is not limited to leg base, platform base, etc.

content.name: bed_frame_horizontal_surface
content.label: Bed frame horizontal surface
content.gloss: Main horizontal support frame for bed

content.name: frame_horizontal_hard_surface
content.label: Frame horizontal hard surface
content.gloss: a horizontal surface part made of a solid piece of wood/metal/plastic or other hard materials.

content.name: frame_horizontal_surface_bar
content.label: Frame horizontal surface bar
content.gloss: horizontal bar forming support for the horizontal surface of a bed.

content.name: bed_side_surface
content.label: Bed Side Surface
content.gloss: Side for a bed side

content.name: bed_side_surface_panel
content.label: Bed Side Surface panel
content.gloss: Side board for a bed frame

content.name: bed_side_surface_vertical_bar
content.label: Bed Side Surface Vertical Bar
content.gloss: a near-vertical bar/strip like part that help form the bed side surface

content.name: bed_side_surface_horizontal_bar
content.label: Bed Side Surface Horizontal Bar
content.gloss: a near-horizontal bar/strip like part that help form the bed side surface

content.name: bed_side_surface_slant_bar
content.label: Bed Side Surface Slant Bar
content.gloss: a slant bar/strip like part that help form the bed side surface. The angle between a slant bar and the ground should be around 30~60 degree. Otherwise, it should be annotated as either vertical or horizontal bars.

content.name: frame_horizontal_bar
content.label: Frame Horizontal Bar
content.gloss: a near-horizontal bar/strip like part that forms part of the bed frame

content.name: frame_vertical_bar
content.label: Frame Vertical Bar
content.gloss: a near-vertical bar/strip like part that forms part of the bed frame

content.name: ladder_vertical_bar
content.label: Ladder Vertical Bar
content.gloss: a near-vertical bar/strip like part that forms part of the ladder

content.name: frame_slant_bar
content.label: Frame Slant Bar
content.gloss: a slant bar/strip like part that forms part of the bed frame. The angle between a slant bar and the ground should be around 30~60 degree. Otherwise, it should be annotated as either vertical or horizontal bars.

content.name: frame_connector
content.label: Frame Connector
content.gloss: a part that connects the frame to another parts of the frame.

content.name: mattress
content.label: Mattress
content.gloss: a large thick pad filled with resilient material and often incorporating coiled springs, used as a bed or part of a bed

content.name: box_spring
content.label: Box spring
content.gloss: a coiled bedspring in a frame that is covered with cloth

content.name: headboard
content.label: Headboard
content.gloss: a vertical board or panel forming the head of a bedstead

content.name: headboard_flat
content.label: Headboard flat
content.gloss: a flat headboard

content.name: headboard_shelves
content.label: Headboard shelves
content.gloss: Headboard that has cabinets and shelves

content.name: headboard_surface
content.label: Headboard surface
content.gloss: the main vertical surface of a headboard

content.name: headboard_frame
content.label: Headboard frame
content.gloss: a framing part to outline the headboard. It includes sub-parts such as back framing vertical bars, back framing horizontal bars, back framing slant bars, back holistic frames, etc.

content.name: footboard
content.label: Footboard
content.gloss: a vertical board or panel forming the foot of a bedstead

content.name: footboard_surface
content.label: Footboard surface
content.gloss: the main vertical surface of a footboard

content.name: footboard_frame
content.label: Footboard frame
content.gloss: a framing part to outline the footboard. It includes sub-parts such as back framing vertical bars, back framing horizontal bars, back framing slant bars, back holistic frames, etc.

content.name: bed_canopy
content.label: Bed canopy
content.gloss: A framed rooflike structure suspended over a bed by the bed rails

content.name: canopy_frame_bar
content.label: Canopy frame bar
content.gloss: Bar forming part of the canopy frame

content.name: canopy_top
content.label: Canopy top
content.gloss: Top part of the canopy

content.name: bed_curtain
content.label: Bed curtain
content.gloss: a curtain hung from a bed canopy

content.name: headboard_lamp
content.label: Headboard lamp
content.gloss: A lamp that is attached to a headboard

content.name: lamp_base
content.label: Lamp base
content.gloss: Lamp base for attachment to furniture

content.name: light
content.label: Light
content.gloss: Part of lamp that emits light

content.name: cabinet_door
content.label: Cabinet door
content.gloss: Door for a cabinet

content.name: cabinet_door_surface
content.label: Cabinet door surface
content.gloss: Surface forming the cabinet door

content.name: hinge
content.label: Hinge
content.gloss: a joint that holds two parts together so that one can swing relative to the other

content.name: shelf
content.label: Shelf
content.gloss: a support that consists of a horizontal surface for holding objects

content.name: handle
content.label: Handle
content.gloss: the appendage to an object that is designed to be held in order to use or move it

content.name: top_panel
content.label: Top panel
content.gloss: a board-like part that forms the top most panel of a shelving unit

content.name: back_panel
content.label: Back panel
content.gloss: Back panel of a shelf, table, or cabinet

content.name: vertical_divider_panel
content.label: Vertical divider panel
content.gloss: Vertical divider panel making one big shelf into smaller cubbies

content.name: vertical_side_panel
content.label: Vertical side panel
content.gloss: main vertical support side panel

content.name: headboard_hard_surface
content.label: Headboard Hard Surface
content.gloss: a front surface part on the headboard for a sitting human to lean the back on. It is usually made of wood/metal/plastic or other hard materials.

content.name: headboard_soft_surface
content.label: Headboard Soft Surface
content.gloss: a front surface part on headboard for a sitting human to lean the back on. It is usually made of leather/fabric/soft stuffs.

content.name: headboard_surface_vertical_bar
content.label: Headboard Surface Vertical Bar
content.gloss: a near-vertical bar/strip like part that help form the headboard surface

content.name: headboard_surface_horizontal_bar
content.label: Headboard Surface Horizontal Bar
content.gloss: a near-horizontal bar/strip like part that help form the headboard surface

content.name: headboard_surface_slant_bar
content.label: Headboard Surface Slant Bar
content.gloss: a slant bar/strip like part that help form the headboard surface. The angle between a slant bar and the ground should be around 30~60 degree. Otherwise, it should be annotated as either vertical or horizontal bars.

content.name: headboard_complex_decoration
content.label: Headboard Complex Decoration
content.gloss: a complex decorative part for the headboard that does not belong to simple bars/strips, frames or surfaces. It usually comes with some complicated geometry and artistic design for decorative purposes.

content.name: footboard_hard_surface
content.label: Footboard Hard Surface
content.gloss: similar to Headboard Hard Surface

content.name: footboard_soft_surface
content.label: Footboard Soft Surface
content.gloss: Similar to Headboard Soft Surface

content.name: footboard_surface_vertical_bar
content.label: Footboard Surface Vertical Bar
content.gloss: Similar to Headboard Surface Vertical Bar

content.name: footboard_surface_horizontal_bar
content.label: Footboard Surface Horizontal Bar
content.gloss: Similar to Headboard Surface Horizontal bar

content.name: footboard_surface_slant_bar
content.label: Footboard Surface Slant Bar
content.gloss: Similar to HeadBoard Surface Slant Bar

content.name: footboard_complex_decoration
content.label: Footboard Complex Decoration
content.gloss: Similar to Headboard Complex Decoration

content.name: holistic_frame
content.label: Holistic Frame
content.gloss: a framing structure for bed that is usually curved, continuous and indivisible into smaller bars/strips

content.name: pillow
content.label: Pillow
content.gloss: an additional/removable cushion to support the head of a sleeping person, or to support the back or hip of a sitting person. Common types of pillow include rectangular pillow, circular pillow, donut pillow, etc.

content.name: blanket
content.label: Blanket
content.gloss: bedding that keeps a person warm in bed

content.name: bed_scarf
content.label: Bed scarf
content.gloss: Throw-like piece of material draped across the foot of the bed

content.name: bed_skirt
content.label: Bed skirt
content.gloss: A decorative drapery attached to the frame of a bed

content.name: rope
content.label: Rope
content.gloss: a strong line

content.name: hook
content.label: Hook
content.gloss: a piece of metal or other material, curved or bent back at an angle, for catching hold of or hanging things on

content.name: hammock_pad
content.label: Hammock pad
content.gloss: hammock bedding pad that is solid

content.name: hammock_netting
content.label: Hammock netting
content.gloss: hammock surface with open-meshed material

content.name: hammock_base
content.label: Hammock base
content.gloss: hammock base

content.name: regular_leg_base
content.label: Regular Leg Base
content.gloss: a leg base that is composed of several vertical leg-like supporting sub-parts, possibly with several connections between legs, and contacts the ground by the legs, some horizontal bars or the foot/caster structure on the legs

content.name: loft_base
content.label: Loft Base
content.gloss: a loft base raises the bed up so that a storage or working area can be placed below the bed

content.name: bar_stretcher
content.label: Bar Stretcher
content.gloss: a supporting part joining the legs that is of bar/strip like shape

content.name: circular_stretcher
content.label: Circular Stretcher
content.gloss: a supporting part joining the legs that is of circular shape

content.name: stairs
content.label: Stairs
content.gloss: a set of steps leading from one level to another

content.name: step_horizontal_surface
content.label: Step horizontal surface
content.gloss: Horizontal surface that is part of a step (also called tread)

content.name: step_vertical_surface
content.label: Step vertical surface
content.gloss: Vertical surface that is part of a step (also called riser)

content.name: wall_side_panel
content.label: Wall side panel
content.gloss: Very large side panel that forms a wall-like surface

content.name: ladder
content.label: Ladder
content.gloss: steps consisting of two parallel members connected by rungs; for climbing up or down

content.name: rung
content.label: Rung
content.gloss: a horizontal support on a ladder for a person's foot

content.name: slide
content.label: Slide
content.gloss: a structure with a smooth sloping surface for something to slide down

content.name: slide_surface
content.label: Slide surface
content.gloss: sloping surface on which something can slide down

content.name: slide_side
content.label: Slide side
content.gloss: Side panels of a slide (used to prevent the sliding object from falling off)

content.name: runner
content.label: Runner
content.gloss: horizontal part that connects the end of legs and contacts the ground

content.name: rocker
content.label: Rocker
content.gloss: a curved support that permits the supported object to rock to and from

content.name: short_leg
content.label: Short Leg
content.gloss: a very short leg that connects the bed and the bed foot/wheels

content.name: surface_base
content.label: Surface Base
content.gloss: a bed base that contacts the ground with some big area. There could be some vertical leg parts.

content.name: bottom_panel
content.label: Bottom panel
content.gloss: a board-like part that touches the ground totally

content.name: side_panel
content.label: Side Panel
content.gloss: a board-like part that supports the bed

content.name: leg
content.label: Leg
content.gloss: one of the supports for a piece of furniture

content.name: foot
content.label: Foot
content.gloss: a support resembling a pedal extremity

content.name: caster
content.label: Wheel Assembly
content.gloss: a pivoting roller attached to the bottom of furniture or trucks or portable machines to make them movable

content.name: brake
content.label: Brake
content.gloss: a restraint used to slow or stop a vehicle

content.name: caster_yoke
content.label: Caster Yoke
content.gloss: forked part for connecting wheel to mounting plate

content.name: caster_stem
content.label: Caster Stem
content.gloss: post part of caster rig

content.name: caster_mounting_plate
content.label: Mounting Plate
content.gloss: a sheet of metal or wood or glass or plastic

content.name: wheel
content.label: Wheel
content.gloss: a simple machine consisting of a circular frame with spokes (or a solid disc) that can rotate on a shaft or axle (as in vehicles or other machines)

content.name: drawer
content.label: Drawer
content.gloss: a boxlike container in a piece of furniture; made so as to slide in and out

content.name: furniture
content.label: Furniture
content.gloss: Other furniture (typically underneath the loft bed)

content.name: cabinet
content.label: Cabinet
content.gloss: Storage furniture with shelves, drawers, and/or cabinet doors

content.name: table
content.label: Table
content.gloss: a piece of furniture with a writing surface and usually drawers or other compartments

content.name: chair
content.label: Chair
content.gloss: a seat for people, typically made of wood or stone.

content.name: support_bar
content.label: Support Bar
content.gloss: part of hammock attachment
